name: avahi-daemon
long_description:
Description =========== Installs/enables or Uninstalls/disables the avahi-daemon service. Requirements ============ This cookbook currently supports the following platforms: Debian, Ubuntu Attributes ========== Set the avahi-daemon service name. 

default['avahi-daemon']['service']['name'] = "avahi-daemon"
Usage ===== Apply recipe avahi-daemon::enable to install/enable all avahi-daemon related services. Recipe avahi-daemon::default takes no action. avahi-daemon::disable recipe ============================ Use a knife command to remove avahi-daemon components from your system like so knife run_list add avahi-daemon::disable
